title: For Sale: T206 Southern Leaguers (Hart and White) - PSA
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Southern Leaguers (Hart and White) - PSA
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
Shipping included in prices, Paypal (with no additional surcharge) or money order fine:

Still available:
Hart (Southern League), Little Rock, Piedmont, PSA 1 - $60
White (Southern League), Old Mill, PSA 2 - $60

Sold:
Griffith (HOF), portrait, Sovereign, PSA 2 - **SOLD**
Orth (Southern League), Old Mill, PSA 2 - **SOLD**
King (Southern League), Piedmont, PSA 1 - **SOLD**
Crawford (HOF), with bat, Piedmont, PSA 3 - **SOLD**

Would also consider trading any of the above for a T206 Ed Foster.

Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any!

Regards,
Adam
